text: Nikhumbule kananjalo okokuba Senza iNdlu49 ukuba ibe yindawo yokuhlanganela kwabantu kwanokuba ibe yindawo yokhuseleko. Ke kaloku thabathani indawo50 awema kuyo uIbrâhîm ukuba ibe yindawo yokuthandazela. Kananjalo Samyalela, uIbrâhîm noIsmâ’îl ukuba bayenze ngcwele iNdlu yaM, bayingcwalisele abo bayijikelezayo nabahlala baphumle kuyo okanye baqubude kuyo
